item.title: A Plot of Mtcars
item.description: Load libraries Build a table Make a plot The greatest challenge is starting. The mtcars dataset is the default for demonstrating both code and plots. Load libraries Any project should begin with the loading of the necessary tools. Code block output is often messy with libraries in that warning messages regarding conflicts in the namespace are verbose. x <- c("dplyr", "magrittr", "kableExtra", "ggplot2") lapply(x, library, character.
